name: Indochinese Housing Development Corporation
description: Our mission is to help create a vibrant and dignified community through the purchase, renovation, maintenance and management of safe, comfortable and affordable housing and through programs that encourage participation, empowerment and independence.
fullDescription: Our mission is to help create a vibrant and dignified community through the purchase, renovation, maintenance and management of safe, comfortable and affordable housing and through programs that encourage participation, empowerment and independence.
whatTheyOffer: Mission is to help create a vibrant and dignified community through the purchase, renovation, maintenance and management of safe, comfortable and affordable housing and through programs that encourage participation, empowerment and independence.
